did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: The First Church of Christ Congregational in Groton, Conn. was established in 1702. The name was changed to Groton Congregational Church in 2007.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The First Church of Christ Congregational in Groton, Conn. was established in 1702. The first meeting house was erected in 1703. Subsequent meeting houses were built in 1767, 1833, and 1902. The name was changed to Groton Congregational Church in 2007.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Four record books, 1727-1893, that include minutes of meetings, records of baptisms, marriages, deaths, lists of pastors, deacons, and church members.
